# f5xc_srv6_network_slice (Resource)

Manages a Srv6NetworkSlice in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Srv6NetworkSlice.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Srv6NetworkSlice will be created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the Srv6NetworkSlice.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to the Srv6NetworkSlice.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the Srv6NetworkSlice.
